post: So you don't care about our children learning how to be kind to people who are different
I don't understand why they have to teach gender ideology garbage in our schools
My children shouldn't give a fuck about who is gay or who isn't, leave them alone.
I'm mad because they want to make my children homosexual, they are too young to be exposed to this useless shit
I hope we could come back to those times when being gay was illegal
